body_text:
Currently, the public APIs for recipes and approvals display a user's email address to identify them. For privacy purposes, we should instead use some form of ID/URL that cannot be traced back to an email address for the user.
If we need to identify users in the admin interface by email, then we should limit exposing that in the public API, and only make it available on the admin instances.

title: Do not expose emails in the public API
body:
Currently, the public APIs for recipes and approvals display a user's email address to identify them. For privacy purposes, we should instead use some form of ID/URL that cannot be traced back to an email address for the user.

If we need to identify users in the admin interface by email, then we should limit exposing that in the public API, and only make it available on the admin instances.
